name: Kona
greetingText: On your birthday may your spirit be enriched in light, love, and hope for a prosperous year ahead.!
wishText: May the heart is always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Dear Chader Kona...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Life should be lived with a smile on your face.
